title: Alpha Gene
description: This is an ACE for ISBN10:098950140X Alpha GeneImagine being able to lift a car, move objects with your mind,become invisible at a moment’s notice or be able to heal thewounded with the touch of your bare hands…Convinced that these talents are hidden in the human brain,Dr. Lucas McKenna had dedicated his life researching for agenetic vaccine that would awaken an Alpha Gene that couldmake all this possible. But the sudden death of his long timefriend and partner, and the fact that he’s accused of hismurder, takes him on an unexpected journey into the smalltown of Templeville, where he learns nature’s plan forevolution is already on the way!The power of the mind, Unleashed!
author: Ángel M. Huerta
